thread.title: Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC Attorneys Recognized in The Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico 2016
thread.title_full: Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC Attorneys Recognized in The Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico 2016

title: Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC Attorneys Recognized in The Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico 2016
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC Attorneys Recognized in The Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico 2016 Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC, a law firm with offices in Guaynabo, Puerto Rico announced Monday that two of the firm's attorneys have been selected by their peers for inclusion in the 3rd edition of The Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico. YouTube Video Jose A.B. Nolla-Mayoral named in Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico 2016 in Labor and Employment Law; Juan M. Casellas-Rodríguez named in Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico 2016 in Banking and Finance Law. GUAYNABO, PUERTO RICO, September 01,   Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC, a law firm with offices in Guaynabo, Puerto Rico announced Monday that two of the firm's attorneys have been selected by their peers for inclusion in the 3rd edition of The Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico . The following attorneys are recognized for excellence in the 2016 edition of Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico for the following practice areas: Jose A.B. Nolla-Mayoral in Labor and Employment Law. (Listed in 2014, 2015, & 2016) Juan M. Casellas-Rodriguez in Banking and Finance Law. (Listed in 2015 & 2016). Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC also earned the Top Listed Award in the Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico (2015 & 2016). These awards are given for most listed lawyers in a particular region/practice. Since Best Lawyers in Puerto Rico was first published in Puerto Rico in 2014, Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC has been represented among this select group of attorneys. The lawyers on Best Lawyers are reviewed by their peers on the basis of professional expertise. This is a prestigious distinction, inasmuch as it reflects that an attorney is current and respected by his or her peers.About Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC Nolla, Palou & Casellas, LLC's Puerto Rico attorneys have plenty of big law / firm, corporate and litigation experience, but offer small firm values. NPC has an active federal and local litigation practice, with seasoned litigators in the Federal and Commonwealth courts systems and before administrative agencies. Its practice includes management labor and employment law counseling and litigation, collective bargaining, employee benefits, real estate and corporate law, civil, personal injury and commercial litigation, and government relations matters. For more information, visit www.npclawyers.com . # # #
